name: A Portrait of your Dinner as a Glazed Ham
name_original: A Portrait of your Dinner as a Glazed Ham
description:
First project in Ren'Py. All images CC0 except Bradley's Jellied Eels which is used in parody. Sutemos character creator by Exuin used for 2 sprites. Ladadori's 120 avatars for 1 sprite. BTL games AI sounds and glitch assets used for 2 bgm 5 sprites and 2 backgrounds. Most of the Music is made with Bosca Ceoil by Terry Cavanagh. All Music is My doings. No one was harmed.

Content Warning: Crude Language, Poor Humor, Mentions of Suicide, tell me the ones I missed, and I'll add them, and then everyone will be Clam Safe

Made for NaNoRenO 2022
